title: Adequacy
description: The ability to supply the demand and energy requirements of the end-use customers.

sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > The ability of the electricity system to supply the aggregate electrical demand and energy requirements of the end-use customers at all times, taking into account scheduled and reasonably expected unscheduled outages of system elements.

sections.title: Definition in a European Union Regulation
sections.body_md: > 'adequacy' means the ability of in-feeds into an area to meet the load in that area;
